Meta.Name: Get_DeveloperTasks_for_Project_by_ProjectID
Meta.Description: Retrieves developer task id and name for project id

CodeGen.SQLStatement: Select tms_pro_developertasks.TMS_PRO_DeveloperTaskID, tms_pro_developertasks.Name As DeveloperTask, tms_pro_developertasks.PercentageComplete From tms_pro_projects Inner Join tms_pro_businesstasks On tms_pro_projects.TMS_PRO_ProjectID = tms_pro_businesstasks.Project_RefID Inner Join tms_pro_businesstask_2_feature On tms_pro_businesstasks.TMS_PRO_BusinessTaskID = tms_pro_businesstask_2_feature.BusinessTask_RefID Inner Join tms_pro_feature On tms_pro_businesstask_2_feature.Feature_RefID = tms_pro_feature.TMS_PRO_FeatureID Inner Join tms_pro_feature_2_developertask On tms_pro_feature.TMS_PRO_FeatureID = tms_pro_feature_2_developertask.Feature_RefID Inner Join tms_pro_developertasks On tms_pro_feature_2_developertask.DeveloperTask_RefID = tms_pro_developertasks.TMS_PRO_DeveloperTaskID Where tms_pro_projects.TMS_PRO_ProjectID = @ProjectID And tms_pro_developertasks.IsDeleted = 0 And tms_pro_developertasks.IsArchived = 0 And tms_pro_developertasks.IsComplete = 0
